data.actual_result: Text has backslash and markdown applied.
data.expected_result: Text should be as written, without the backslash.
data.short_description: Using backslash to avoid any markdown ignores the backslash and reads as though the backslash were just another character.
data.steps_to_repro: - In any client, type with a backslash and markdown. - View text on mobile.
